summary: Predict values based on a Random Forest model
description: Applies a Random Forest machine learning model to an array and predict a value for it.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A model object that can be trained with the processes ``fit_regr_random_forest()`` (regression) and ``fit_class_random_forest()`` (classification).

returns.description: The predicted value. Returns `null` if any of the given values in the array is a no-data value.
